contents:
First they came for the foreigners,
and I did not speak out,
because I was not a foreigner.

Then they came for the protestors,
and I did not speak out,
because I was not a protestor.

Then they came for the journalists,
and I did not speak out,
because I was not a journalist.

And then they came for street artists...
but I did not speak out,
because I am not a street artist.

And I realised that eventually, _____________________________

动动手呀动动脑，使句子变完整。：）
